imdb.plot outline: Imagine a business thriving on death - on the dead. The clients? Outcasts, misfits who went from rags to riches - an opportunity too good to pass up. This is what Lazare is about - all off the books, of course. One needs to eat. Especially when one is meant to be - dead.
imdb.title: Lazare
plot: Imagine a business thriving on death - on the dead. The clients? Outcasts, misfits who went from rags to riches - an opportunity too good to pass up. This is what _Lazare_ (qv) is about - all off the books, of course. One needs to eat. Especially when one is meant to be - dead.::Serge Adam
